ReactScanDemo.title: React Scan Performance Demo
ReactScanDemo.description: Interactive demonstration of React Scan performance monitoring capabilities

instructions.title: How to Use This Demo
instructions.step1: Press Ctrl+Shift+X to toggle React Scan on/off
instructions.step2: Click the buttons below to trigger different types of renders
instructions.step3: Watch for red highlights (unnecessary renders) and green highlights (optimized renders)
instructions.step4: Use the React Scan toolbar in the bottom-right corner for detailed analysis

about.pageDescription: Learn more about our company, mission, and the team dedicated to delivering quality products.

hero.title: About Our Company
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Global Trade
hero.description: We are a leading manufacturer and exporter specializing in high-quality industrial products. With years of experience in international trade, we are committed to delivering excellence to clients worldwide.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide innovative, high-quality products that meet the evolving needs of our global customers, while maintaining the highest standards of service and integrity.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We never compromise on quality. Every product undergoes rigorous testing and quality control.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We invest in R&D to bring cutting-edge solutions to market.

service.title: Customer Service
service.description: Your success is our priority. We provide comprehensive pre-sale and after-sale support.

integrity.title: Business Integrity
integrity.description: We build long-term relationships based on trust, transparency, and mutual respect.

cta.title: Ready to Work With Us?
cta.description: Contact our team to discuss your requirements and discover how we can help grow your business.

products.pageDescription: Explore our comprehensive range of high-quality products for your business needs.
